projects.title: Penpot Heroicons Plugin
projects.description: A plugin for Penpot that allows easy search and insertion of Heroicons into designs
projects.longDescription: Developed a plugin for Penpot that enables designers to quickly search and insert Heroicons into their designs. The plugin features a compact grid layout and efficient search functionality.
projects.impact: Improved designer workflow by providing quick access to Heroicons within Penpot
projects.problem: Designers needed an efficient way to access and insert Heroicons in Penpot
projects.solution: Created a plugin with search functionality and grid layout for easy icon access

projects.title: ThingsBoard Mobile App
projects.description: Contributed to the development of ThingsBoard's Flutter mobile application
projects.longDescription: Made significant contributions to both the open-source and enterprise versions of ThingsBoard's Flutter mobile application, helping create a powerful IoT mobile platform.
projects.impact: Enhanced the mobile experience for ThingsBoard users with improved features and functionality
projects.problem: Need for a robust mobile interface for ThingsBoard IoT platform
projects.solution: Contributed to both open-source and enterprise versions of the mobile application

projects.title: Cost Calculator
projects.description: Script for project cost estimation and calculation
projects.longDescription: Developed a script to help estimate and calculate project costs, streamlining the project planning process
projects.problem: Need for accurate and efficient project cost estimation
projects.solution: Created an automated calculation script for project costs

projects.title: ThemePathPro Figma Plugin
projects.description: Figma plugin for swapping between styles and fixing community issues
projects.longDescription: Created a Figma plugin that addresses style management issues in the community and provides enhanced style swapping capabilities
projects.impact: Improved workflow for Figma users dealing with style management
projects.problem: Style management issues in Figma community
projects.solution: Developed a plugin for efficient style swapping and management

projects.title: React Doc Viewer
projects.description: Contributed to React document viewer component
projects.longDescription: Made contributions to the React Doc Viewer project, enhancing document viewing capabilities in React applications
projects.impact: Enhanced document viewing capabilities in React applications
projects.problem: Need for improved document viewing in React
projects.solution: Contributed improvements to the React Doc Viewer component

projects.title: ThingsBoard Installation Guide
projects.description: Updated ThingsBoard documentation to simplify installation process
projects.longDescription: Forked and improved the ThingsBoard project documentation to make the installation process more straightforward and user-friendly
projects.impact: Simplified ThingsBoard installation process for users

projects.title: GraphHopper Navigation Android
projects.description: Enhanced Android navigation library with fixes and improvements
projects.longDescription: Forked and improved the GraphHopper navigation Android library, fixing issues and publishing updates as GitHub packages
projects.solution: Fixed bugs and published improved package

projects.title: mac-dev-setup
projects.description: Automated macOS developer machine setup with Homebrew and scripts
projects.longDescription: A streamlined setup for macOS development machines using Homebrew and shell scripts to install common tools, apps, and dotfiles for a consistent developer environment.
projects.impact: Speeds up onboarding and ensures consistent local environments
projects.problem: Manual machine setup is slow and inconsistent
projects.solution: Automate installation of packages, apps, and developer tooling

projects.title: bulk-image-importer
projects.description: CLI utility to import and process images in bulk
projects.longDescription: Command-line tool for batch importing images with basic processing steps and automation-friendly defaults, useful for catalogs and content pipelines.
projects.impact: Reduces manual work for large image batches
projects.solution: Provide a scriptable CLI for batch operations

projects.title: pdf2csv
projects.description: Convert PDF documents to CSV for analysis
projects.longDescription: A utility that extracts tabular data from PDFs and exports clean CSV files for downstream analysis, reporting, or ingestion.
projects.impact: Unlocks data trapped in PDFs for easier processing
projects.problem: Tabular data in PDFs is hard to reuse
projects.solution: Automate extraction and export to CSV

projects.title: mstore-api-optimizer
projects.description: API response optimization and tooling for MStore workflows
projects.longDescription: Tools and scripts to optimize API responses and performance in MStore-related integrations, improving perceived speed and reliability.
projects.impact: Improves API efficiency and response times
projects.solution: Provide optimizations and scripts for leaner responses

projects.title: EnvSeeder
projects.description: Seed and manage environment variables for projects
projects.longDescription: A helper utility to seed, validate, and manage environment variables across local and CI environments, reducing misconfiguration and setup time.
projects.impact: Prevents configuration drift and speeds up onboarding
projects.problem: Environment setup is error-prone and manual
projects.solution: Automate seeding and validation of env vars
